column2: English
Training
Alpha Black to Papa Bear. Objective One, Colmont, is pretty well wrecked. Over.
Papa Bear, Papa Bear, this is Alpha Black. The outpost, Objective Two, is clear. Over.
Alpha Black to Papa Bear. The intersection at Gotcrosse is our bitch. Objective three complete. Over.
Alpha One calling Papa Bear. Fourth objective complete. Fortmond is a Red cemetary now. Over.
Alpha One to Bravo airlift. Requesting extraction. Over.
Team Alpha, I have the LZ in sight. Get ready for a fast rope insert. Good luck. Bravo out.
Bravo here. Copy that Alpha. Dustoff on way. Out.
Alpha One, this is Bravo; we're overhead. Prepare your men for extraction. Over.
Okay, I'm putting the nose down and making like a rabbit. Next stop, home. Bravo out.
Roger that, Alpha Black. Plant a couple of mines in case Mr Armor shows up to investigate. Papa Bear out.
Understood, Alpha One. Good work. Stay light on your feet. HQ out.
Papa Bear to Alpha. We copy you, Alpha. Stay out of the way of Ivan's armor. Out.
Alpha Black, this is Papa Bear. Acknowledged. Good job. HQ out.
We read you, Alpha Black. Welcome back. Your mission is accomplished, all raid objectives complete. Papa Bear out.
LZ X-Ray
Gross, Ranger, at Ummanz Airbase.
Start
LZ X-Ray
Extract LZ
Clear Colmont
Destroy Outpost
Clear Gotcrosse
Neutralize Fortmond
